maqras.text: 26|111|Kare-ra wa itta. `Mottomo iyashī-sha-tachi ga anata ni shitagatte iru to iu no ni, watashi-tachi made anata o shinjiru nodesu ka.'
26|112|Kare (nūfu) wa itta. `Kare-ra ga okonatte iru koto ni tsuite, watashi ga nani o shirimashou ka.
26|113|Kare-ra no seisan wa, tada watashi no omo ni zokusuru nodesu. Moshi anata gataga rikai surunaraba.
26|114|Mata watashi wa, shinkō suru mono-tachi o oiharaimasen.
26|115|Watashi wa kōmeina hitori no keikoku-sha ni suginai nodesu.'
26|116|Kare-ra wa itta. `Anata ga tomenainara, nūfu yo, kanarazu ishi-uchi ni sa rerudeshou.'
26|117|Kare wa (inotte) itta. `Omo yo, hontōni watashi no min wa watashi o uso-tsukidearu to mōshimasu.
26|118|Sorede watashi to kare-ra no ma o, shikkari o sabaki kudasare, watashi to, watashi to issho no shinja-tachi o sukutte kudasai.'
26|119|Sokode ware wa kare to, kare to issho no mono-tachi o, mansai shita fune no naka ni sukutte yatta.
26|120|Sorekara ware wa ato ni nokotta-sha-tachi o obore saseta.
26|121|Hontōni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no ōku wa shinjinai.
26|122|Hontōni anata no shu, kare wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukaku ara reru.
26|123|Ādo (no min) mo, shito-tachi o uso-tsukidearu to shita.
26|124|Kare-ra no dōhō no fūdo ga kare-ra ni itta toki o omoiokose. `Anata gata wa omo o osorenai nodesu ka.
26|125|Hontōni watashi wa, anata gata e no seijitsuna shitodesu.
26|126|Dakara arrā o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai.
26|127|Mata watashi wa, kono koto de anata gata ni hōshū o motomemasen. Watashi e no hōshū wa, tada ban'yū no nushi kara (itadaku) dakedesu.
26|128|Anata gata wa kōchi to iu kōchi ni itazura ni ishibumi o tateru nodesu ka.
26|129|Mata anata gata wa (eien ni) sumou to shite, kengona kōrō o tateru nodesu ka.
26|130|Anata gata wa bōryoku o fuu toki, bōgyaku-sha no yō ni furumau nodesu ka.
26|131|Arrā o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai.
26|132|Anata gata ga shiru hodo no mono o, sadzuke rareru-kata o osore nasai.
26|133|Kare wa kazukazu no kachiku to shison o, anata gata ni sadzuke rare,
26|134|mata kaju-en ya izumi o mo sadzuke rareta.
26|135|Watashi wa anata gata ni kuwae rareru idaina hi no chōbatsu o hontōni osoreru.'
26|136|Kare-ra wa itta. `Anata ga sekkyō shite mo sekkyō shinakute mo, watashi-tachi ni totte wa onaji kotodesu.
26|137|Hontōni kore wa, mukashi no yarikata ni sotonarimasen.
26|138|Watashi-tachi wa chōbatsu sa renai nodesu.'
26|139|Kare-ra wa, kare o uso-tsukidearu to shita. Sokode ware wa kare-ra o horoboshita. Hontōni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no ōku wa shinjinai.
26|140|Hontōni anata no omo wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukai okata de ara reru.
26|141|Samūdo (no min) mo, shito-tachi o uso-tsukidearu to shita.
26|142|Kare-ra no dōhō sārifu ga, kare-ra ni itta toki o omoiokoshi nasai. `Anata gata wa omo o osorenai nodesu ka.
26|143|Hontōni watashi wa, anata gata e no seijitsuna shitodesu.
26|144|Dakara arrā o osore watashi ni shitagai nasai.
26|145|Watashi wa anata gata ni kono koto de hōshū o motomenai. Watashi e no hōshū wa, tada ban'yū no nushi kara (itadaku) dakedesu.
26|146|Anata gata wa koko de, itsu made mo antaide i raremashou ka.
26|147|Kaju-en ya izumi,
26|148|kokumotsu hata ya, migotona waka mi o tsukeru natsumeyashi no en,
26|149|mata (iwa) yama ni, anata gataga takumi ni ie o kiri ugatte mo (antaideari eyou ka).
26|150|Dakara arrā o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai.
26|151|Anata gata wa, muhōna jōkiwoisshita-sha no meirei ni, shitagatte wa narimasen.
26|152|Kare-ra wa chijō ni kigai o hikiokosu mono de,(akuhei o) kyōsei suru monode wa arimasen.'
26|153|Kare-ra wa itta. `Anata wa tsuka reta mono ni sugimasen.
26|154|Anata wa, watashi-tachi to onaji hitori no ningen ni sugimasen. Anata no iu no ga hontōnara, watashi-tachi ni shirushi o motarashi nasai.'
26|155|Kare (sārifu) wa itta. `Koko ni ittō no mesu rakuda ga imasu. Soreni mo mizunomi-bi ga ari, mata anata gata ni mo,(sorezore) kimerareta mizunomi-bi ga arimasu.
26|156|Idaina-bi no chōbatsu ga anata gata o osowanai yō, soreni gai o kuwaete wa narimasen.'
26|157|Daga kare-ra wa, sono ken o kitte fugu ni shi, tachimachi kōkai suru koto ni natta.
26|158|Sore wa chōbatsu ga kare-ra o osottakaradearu. Hontōni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no ōku wa shinjinai.
26|159|Hontōni anata no omo wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukai okata de ara reru.
26|160|Rūto no min mo shito-tachi o uso-tsukidearu to shita.
26|161|Dōhō rūto ga, kare-ra ni,`anata gata wa omo o osorenai nodesu ka.' To itta toki o omoiokoshi nasai.
26|162|`Hontōni watashi wa, anata gata e no seijitsuna shitodesu.
26|163|Dakara arrā o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai.
26|164|Watashi wa anata gata ni kono koto de hōshū o motomemasen. Watashi e no hōshū wa, daredare ban'yū no nushi kara (itadaku) dakedesu.
26|165|Anata gata wa sōzō sa reta mono no naka otoko dake ni chikadzuki,
26|166|-nushi ga anata gata no tame ni tsukura reta haigūsha o kaeriminai nodesu ka. Iya, anata gata wa tsumiwookasu-shadesu.'
26|167|Kare-ra wa (kotaete) itta. `Īkagen tomenainara, rūto yo, anata wa kanarazu tsuihō sa rerudeshou.'
26|168|Kare (rūto wa) itta. `Watashi wa, hontōni anata gata no okonai o imikiratte imasu.
26|169|Omo yo, watashi to watashinokazoku o, kare-ra no shogyō kara o sukui kudasai.'
26|170|Sorede ware wa, kare to kare no kazoku o subete sukutta.
26|171|Ato ni nokotta, rōjo (rūto no tsuma) wa betsudeattaga.
26|172|Sore kara, ware wa soto no mono o horoboshita.
26|173|Ware wa,(-seki no) ame o kare-ra no ue ni fura seta. Keikoku sa rete ita-sha-tachi ni wa, saiyaku no amedeatta.
26|174|Hontōni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no ōku wa shinjinai.
26|175|Hontōni anata no omo wa iryoku narabinaki jihibukaki okata de ara reru.
26|176|Mori no hitobito mo shito-tachi o uso-tsukidearu to shita.
26|177|Shuaibu ga kare-ra ni,`anata gata wa omo o osorenai nodesu ka.' To itta toki o omoiokoshi nasai.
26|178|Kare (shuaibu) wa itta. `Hontōni watashi wa, anata gata e no seijitsuna shitodesu.
26|179|Dakara arrā o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai.
26|180|Watashi wa anata gata ni kono koto de hōshū o motomenai. Watashi e no hōshū wa, ii ban'yū no nushi kara (itadaku) dakedesu.
